issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Implement TO_TIME([number] ms) function
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12180](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12180). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Converts ms, the number of milliseconds since midnight, to a time.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12180?focusedCommentId=17317157) by João Pedro Antunes Ferreira (jpedroantunes):*
Already solved on the Pull Request: <https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9890>
